description:
Problem Description:
When attempting to train a pytorch model, a MemoryError is thrown due to insufficient memory resources. The MemoryError occurs when the pytorch model tries to allocate more memory than the system can provide.
code:
import torch

x = torch.randn(3, 2)
y = torch.randn(3, 2)

z = torch.add(x, y)

print(z)
